dict.string: Legalxgen requires access to your camera to help you easily capture and upload photos of receipts while submitting expenses. This streamlines the process and ensures accurate record-keeping for your time and billing activities.
We need your location to provide location-based services.
Legalxgen requires access to your photo library to save copies of expense receipts that you capture. This allows you to keep a record of your submissions for future reference.

Legalxgen requires access to your photo library so you can easily upload existing receipts while submitting expenses. This ensures a smooth and accurate expense submission process.ÃŸ UILaunchStoryboardName LaunchScreen UIMainStoryboardFile Main UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities
